column2: I have discovered some ancient texts which indicate that my beliefs may originate from this religion. I should bring my faith to its roots.
Religion stagnates over time. If I do not do something, it may encourage heretical thinking. I should evolve my faith to Catharism.
Religion stagnates over time. If I do not do something, it may encourage heretical thinking. I should evolve my faith to Bogomilism.
